about_the_game:
Welcome, Adventurer! We created this book to help you in your quest through Robin Morningwood Adventure: The Whellcum’s secret, and its DLC: Attack of the gay clones.

Robin Morningwood Adventure will hide no more secrets from you, because we reveal absolutely everything you need to know to finish the game 100%. We also share some game development stories throughout the book, and tell you about the inspiration for the game design and the art.

We took the liberty of illustrating this book with some hot images from the game, which we hope you’ll enjoy...

... Happy reading!

content_descriptors.notes: This book is about our bara-game, and depicts sexual acts between men on many pages. These scenes are varied and some may also feature drug or alcohol use, as well as BDSM, voyeurism or uro-play.
